com.diffplug.common.swt

Class LayoutsFillLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diffplug.common.swt.LayoutsFillLayout

  • public class LayoutsFillLayout
extends java.lang.Object
    A fluent api for setting and modifying a FillLayout. Created by static methods in Layouts. Inspired by Moritz Post: http://eclipsesource.com/blogs/2013/07/25/efficiently-dealing-with-swt-gridlayout-and-griddata/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the raw FillLayout.

      LayoutsFillLayout marginHeight(int marginHeight) 
      LayoutsFillLayout marginWidth(int marginWidth) 
      LayoutsFillLayout noMargin()
      Sets the margins to zero.
      LayoutsFillLayout noSpacing()
      Sets the spacing to zero.
      LayoutsFillLayout spacing(int spacing) 
      LayoutsFillLayout vertical()
